bug.author: ausk
bug.summary: Can't download TensorRT 7.x, "Failed to ssl_handshake: handshake failed"
bug.description:
Hi, I want to use TensorRT 7.x on my PC . So I should download the install package from the site: <denchmark-link:https://developer.nvidia.com/nvidia-tensorrt-7x-download>https://developer.nvidia.com/nvidia-tensorrt-7x-download</denchmark-link> .
TensorRT-7.0.0.11.Windows10.x86_64.cuda-10.2.cudnn7.6.zip TensorRT-7.0.0.11.Ubuntu-18.04.x86_64-gnu.cuda-10.2.cudnn7.6.tar.gz TensorRT-7.0.0.11.Ubuntu-16.04.x86_64-gnu.cuda-10.2.cudnn7.6.tar.gz
But I don't know why all packages are 1 kb. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4545060/85646124-fac53300-b6cd-11ea-9283-2ab377171094.png></denchmark-link>
Then I just open the zip in editor, I see the content is:
Failed to ssl_handshake: handshake failed
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4545060/85646288-60192400-b6ce-11ea-8671-4293665b1054.png></denchmark-link>
Please, can anyone tell me how to download the full packages correctly?

comments.comment: Same. Possibly there's sth wrong behind the website.
Hi, I raised this issue and it's being investigated.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/rmccorm4>@rmccorm4</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ausk>@ausk</denchmark-link>
What's the outcome of investigation? We hit this kind of issue frequently.
